chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
Y: Type
X: Type
c: (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y
lc: X -> nat
Hc: forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x
P: (nat * list X)%type
j: nat
err: nat
i: nat

Goal:
j < fst P \/ length (snd P) + fst P < j -> linker j = err

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat j : nat |- Type] ?B : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat j : nat |- Type]
snd : ?A * ?B -> ?B where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat j : nat |- Type] ?B : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat j : nat |- Type]
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
linker = let ll := (length (snd P) + fst P, lsum (snd P) + i) :: link (fst P) (snd P) i in fun j : nat => match list_assoc Nat.eq_dec j ll with | Some p => p | None => err end : nat -> nat Arguments linker _%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Tauto.X : ?TX -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat j : nat |- Type] ?TX : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X ->...-> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat j : nat |- Type]
Tauto.D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat j : nat |- Type] ?TX : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X ->...-> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat j : nat |- Type]
Tauto.A : ?TA -> ?AA -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat j : nat |- Type] ?TX : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X ->...-> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat j : nat |- Type]
Tauto.Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat j : nat |- Type] ?TX : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X ->...-> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat j : nat |- Type]
Tauto.I : Tauto.GFormula -> option ?AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat j : nat |- Type] ?TX : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X ->...-> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat j : nat |- Type]

inr : ?B -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat j : nat |- Type] ?B : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat j : nat |- Type]
pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat j : nat |- Type] ?B : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat j : nat |- Type]
nil : list ?A where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat j : nat |- Type]

in_code : nat -> code ?X -> Prop where ?X : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat j : nat |- Type]

subcode_length_le : forall (X : Type) (P : code X) (Q : nat * list X), P <sc Q -> fst Q <= fst P /\ fst P + length (snd P) <= fst Q + length (snd Q)
link = fix link (i : nat) (ll : list X) (j : nat) {struct ll} : list (nat * nat) := match ll with | nil => nil | x :: ll0 => (i, j) :: link (S i) ll0 (lc x + j) end : nat -> list X -> nat -> list (nat * nat) Arguments link _%nat_scope _%list_scope _%nat_scope
subcode_length' : forall (X : Type) (P : code X) (Q : nat * list X), P <sc Q -> length (snd P) <= length (snd Q)
linker_app : forall ll mm : list X, snd P = ll ++ mm -> linker (length ll + fst P) = lsum ll + i
